name: Rumble: Loud City Tank
description:
Rumble the Bison doesn't get enough love, so I decided to design a shirt for him. So, show your Thunder Pride & Feel the Rumble of Loud City with this tank! 

*Printed on American Apparel Neon Yellow Poly Cotton Tank*

*Size Chart:
Small: Chest Size - 34-36; Waist Size - 30-32
Medium: Chest Size - 38-40; Waist Size - 32-33
Large: Chest Size - 42-44; Waist Size - 33-34
X-Large: Chest Size - 46-48; Waist Size - 36-38

name: James Harden Fear the Beard Tank
description:
Thunder up with this awesome tank that pays homage to the NBA's 6th man of the Year, James Harden...& his beard! You can feel the electricity with this neon yellow tank top!

*Printed on American Apparel Neon Yellow Poly Cotton Tank*

*Size Chart:
Small: Chest Size - 34-36; Waist Size - 30-32
Medium: Chest Size - 38-40; Waist Size - 32-33
Large: Chest Size - 42-44; Waist Size - 33-34
X-Large: Chest Size - 46-48; Waist Size - 36-38

**Orders will typically ship within two to ten business days of purchase, pending availability and verification. Once your order ships, you will be sent an e-mail with your tracking number.

**No International Orders at this time**

**Product ships from Oklahoma**

name: James Harden Fear the Beard Shirt
description:
This is a shirt I designed for one of my favorite OKC Thunder players, James Harden. The design is printed on pre-shrunk cotton, and has a feel comparable to American Apparel, so these shirts are awesome quality. 

**Size Chart:
S: Chest - 38 in; Body Length - 28 in
M: Chest - 41 in; Body Length - 29 in
L: Chest - 44 in; Body Length - 30 in
XL: Chest - 48 in; Body Length - 31 in
XXL: Chest - 52 in; Body Length - 32 in

**Orders will typically ship within two to ten business days of purchase, pending availability and verification. Once your order ships, you will be sent an e-mail with your tracking number.

**No International Orders at this time**

**Product ships from Oklahoma**
